WotD61 - Art

Sep 25, 2015

There are so many lovely quotationsÂ about art, today's post seems somewhat futile...

So here's a selection, pick your favourite and go make some art. I know it's scary, but art is a big old word it covers a whole world of things... Take a risk. You know you want to!

Seth Godin...

If you are willing to do something that might not work, you are closer to being an artist.

Today's #PositivePostIt word was #Art not #indecision despite my giddiness... #Inspiration #Quote #Blog http://helenwalker.net/2015/09/25/wotd61-art/

A photo posted by Helen Walker (@h313n1w) on Sep 25, 2015 at 10:32am PDT

Jean Anouilh...

The object of art is to give life a shape.

Edgar Degas...

Art is not what you see, it is what you make others see.

Indecision... #PositivePostItNotes part 1

Frederich Nietzche...

No artist tolerates reality.

Ralph Waldo Emmerson...

Every artist was first an amateur.

#PositivePostIt indecision... Part2 #Quote #Blog

Leonardo da Vinci...

Art is never finished, it is only abandoned.
